item.description: A list of tags. TYPE/ Tag Description atom Self-contained file, links to other files (ex: [[Element]]) list File that lists things, (ex: this note) note File whose content is created from a source, generally unstructured.

Vault guides tags metadata Rename tags for classes theme hub note compendium templates Give attachments descriptive names Fix school tags Use TODO:: to mark what is needed to do, then clarify with a callout
